name: Odenavirus Online
description:
{STEAM_APP_IMAGE} /extras/imagem_descricao.png [/ img]

Odenavirus is a point-and-click game that the player is trapped in a building during a pandemic, and needs to create relationships with the characters and interact to progress.

Is odenavirus real? Or is it a big media conspiracy to scare the population? Unravel the truth!

It is possible to create intimacy with each character in the game, with several options on how to respond to them, each having their own personality. There are more than 40 missions, with fun dialogues and a touching story! Main highlights: [/ h2]
  • Customize your character
  • Take care of your needs
  • Do missions to progress the storyline and unlock more scenarios and characters
  • Work to earn money
  • Buy items and set up your room however you want
  • Interact with other players
  • Create intimacy with the characters in the game[/ list]
